long_description: The family-friendly Freescape Folding Sheath Knife from Gerber features a safety that allows the user to lock the knife closed when not in use, keeping little fingers from harm. 3.5-inch blade constructed of high-quality 7Cr17MoV steel is ideal for family-centered activities around camp. Abbreviated partial serration cuts rope and twine with ease. Dual thumb studs allow simple 1-handed opening. Blade locks in closed position too, as a safety precaution. Super-grippy rubberized Freescape textured handle has green accents so it won't get lost in the shuffle. Both the safety and the lock-back function can be used with gloves on in cold conditions. Gerber Freescape Folding Sheath Knife has a lanyard hole and comes with a durable sheath that can hang from a belt.
short_description: The family-friendly Freescape Folding Sheath Knife from Gerber features a safety that allows the user to lock the knife closed when not in use, keeping little fingers from harm.
